            #include <bits/stdc++.h>

                    string temp = "";
                    for (char c : s) {
                        if (c == 'W') {
                            if (temp != "") {
                                v.push_back(temp);
                                temp = "";
                            }
                        } else {
                            temp += c;
                        }
                    }
                    if (temp != "") {
                        v.push_back(temp);
                    }
                    for (string seg : v) {
                        if (seg.length() == 1) {
                            ans = false;
                            break;
                        }
                        bool hasR = false, hasB = false;
                        for (char c : seg) {
                            if (c == 'R') hasR = true;
                            else hasB = true;
                        }
                        if (!hasR || !hasB) {
                            ans = false;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                    cout << (ans ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
                }
            }
